text: The Stadion Poznań (), also called the Municipal Stadium (), is a football stadium in Poznań, Poland. It is the home stadium of Lech Poznań. It has a capacity of 42,837, which makes it the fourth largest stadium in Poland. The stadium was built between 1968 and 1980. It was opened on 23 August 1980. == Other websites == * Official stadium website Category:1980 establishments in Europe Category:1980s establishments in Poland Poznan Category:Buildings and structures in Poznań
title: Stadion Poznań
